thread.section_title: Hotel L'Antoine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: Good value hotel in a great location - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dweezil28
title: Good value hotel in a great location
text:
A little tired around some edges but still a lovely place to stay and it's great value in a lively area - plenty of great bars and restaurants within metres
Close Gare de Lyon, easy access to the main sights of Paris.
Small rooms but they have everything you need, great powerful showers, comfy beds.
Friendly and helpful staff and good coffee!
